verses.roman:
tasmāt kṛṣṇāya mahate
dīyatāṁ paramārhaṇam
evaṁ cet sarva-bhūtānām
ātmanaś cārhaṇaṁ bhavet

synonyms: tasmāt—therefore; kṛṣṇāya—to Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahate—the Supreme; dīyatām—should be given; parama—the greatest; arhaṇam—honor; evam—in this manner; cet—if; sarva—of all; bhūtānām—living beings; ātmanaḥ—of oneself; ca—and; arhaṇam—honoring; bhavet—will be.
translation: Therefore we should give the highest honor to Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Lord. If we do so, we will be honoring all living beings and also our own selves.
